bug.author: karyboy
bug.summary: Build fails on macOS Sierra/Ubuntu 14.04 with java wrapper enabled for Saliency Module when including opencv_contrib modules
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => 3.2 Operating System / Platform => macOS Sierra 10.12.2/ Ubuntu 14.04 Compiler => clang
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
Can be found here(<denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv_contrib/issues/1034>opencv/opencv_contrib#1034</denchmark-link> ). I earlier opened the issue in the opencv_contrib repo. The issue is in opencv, hence opening it here. <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Also can be found at the issue referenced above. <denchmark-h:h5>The fix</denchmark-h>
Someone has an open pr for the fix here <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/pull/8111>#8111</denchmark-link>
